event.title: Protecting your innovations, CeBIT, Hanover, Germany

body.p: Some people argue that you have to protect innovations. FSFE's Vice President Matthias Kirschner attends a panel discussion organised by the European Patent Office which discusses several ways how to approach this aim. The topics range between copyright methods, software patents, and their implications for Free Software. The event takes place in hall 8 from 16:30 until 17:15 and is in English.
